translations: v.腐烂；衰退（decay 的过去分词）

sentences.sentence: The bodies buried in the fine ash slowly decayed.
sentences.translation: 埋在细灰里的尸体慢慢腐烂了。

sentences.sentence: In practice, the agency system has decayed. Most "agents" now sell only to themselves or their immediate family.
sentences.translation: 实际上，这种代理制已经衰退。现在，大多数“代理人”都只把产品卖给自己或亲近的家人。

sentences.sentence: If the body has only partially decayed, it is reburied in a smaller cheaper grave, but not for long, the body will be dug up again some time later when it has fully decayed.
sentences.translation: 如果尸体没有完全腐烂，尸体会被重新埋在一个较小较廉价的墓地中，不久后，当尸体完全腐烂时，就会被再次挖出来。
